mapper.insert: INSERT INTO torrents (info_hash, name, size, private_torrent) VALUES (#{e.infoHash}, #{e.name}, #{e.size}, #{e.privateTorrent}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE size = CASE WHEN size <= 0 THEN #{e.size} ELSE size END, private_torrent = CASE WHEN private_torrent IS NULL THEN #{e.privateTorrent} ELSE private_torrent END;
